statements.select:
SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY AA.ID DESC) AS RowNo , AA.ID , AA.CreateDate , AA.CreateBy , AA.CreateByName , AA.UpdateDate , AA.UpdateBy , AA.UpdateByName
, AA.BizType , AA.BizNo , AA.BizName , AA.RepName , AA.BizKind , AA.BizItem , AA.Status
FROM IKBIZ.dbo.BMBusiness AA WITH (NOLOCK) LEFT JOIN IKBAS.dbo.ACCode M1 WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.BizType = M1.Code AND M1.ParentCode = 'BizType' WHERE 1=1
AND ( AA.BizNo LIKE '%' + #FindText# + '%' OR AA.BizName LIKE '%' + #FindText# + '%' OR AA.RepName LIKE '%' + #FindText# + '%' OR AA.BizKind LIKE '%' + #FindText# + '%' OR AA.BizItem LIKE '%' + #FindText# + '%' )
AND AA.Status = #Status#
AND AA.BizType = #BizType#
ORDER BY RowNo

SELECT AA.ID , AA.CreateDate , AA.CreateBy , AA.CreateByName , AA.UpdateDate , AA.UpdateBy , AA.UpdateByName
, AA.BizType , AA.BizNo , AA.BizName , AA.RepName , AA.BizKind , AA.BizItem , AA.Status , AA.AddressID , BB.PostalCode , BB.City , BB.StateProvince , BB.Country , BB.AddressLine1 , BB.AddressLine2
FROM dbo.BMBusiness AA WITH (NOLOCK) LEFT JOIN IKBIZ.dbo.BMAddress BB WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.AddressID = BB.ID WHERE AA.ID = #ID#
statements.insert:
INSERT INTO dbo.BMBusiness ( CreateDate, CreateBy, CreateByName, BizType, BizNo, BizName, RepName, BizKind, BizItem, AddressID, Status ) VALUES ( GetDate(), #CreateBy#, #CreateByName#, #BizType#, #BizNo#, #BizName#, #RepName#, #BizKind#, #BizItem#, #AddressID#, #Status# )
SELECT @@IDENTITY AS ID
statements.update:
UPDATE dbo.BMBusiness SET UpdateDate = GetDate() , UpdateBy = #UpdateBy# , UpdateByName = #UpdateByName#
, BizType = #BizType# , BizNo = #BizNo# , BizName = #BizName# , RepName = #RepName# , BizKind = #BizKind# , BizItem = #BizItem# , Status = #Status# , AddressID = #AddressID# WHERE ID = #ID#
